description:
From our law office in Jersey City, New Jersey, attorney Ebony Anuforo and the dedicated legal professionals at the Anuforo Law Firm, LLC, provide unmatched counsel and support to clients across our region and around the world who are dealing with complex, pressing immigration-related legal issues, such as any of the following:

  • Family-based immigration
  • Abused spouse petitions
  • E-2 investor visas
  • Asylum and refugee
  • Employment immigration
  • Naturalization and citizenship
  • Deportation defense
  • Immigration compliance

In addition, our law firm also provides invaluable counseling for entrepreneurs and business owners with needs involving business startups, contracts and general business matters. No matter the legal issues you need to address, you can rely on us for comprehensive advice so that you can make the best-informed decisions, and we will work diligently to help you achieve your goals and the favorable outcomes you seek as efficiently and cost-effectively as possible.

A top-ranked lawyer, Ms. Anuforo has 10 years of total legal experience, and she holds certification as an anti-money laundering specialist. She is also an active member of many local, state and national legal organizations, so you can expect to receive the highest level of personalized representation for your legal issues.

To find out more about how we can best serve your needs, you can contact Anuforo Law Firm, LLC, by calling our office or visiting our website to schedule a consultation. We also currently offer virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
